description: Jeffrey Lloyd and Dakota Payne have fidelity issues -- there's no way around it. They keep their private relationships going, but they indulge their selfish sexual fantasies with each other and leave their respective partners home to be cuckolds. Here Jeffrey and Dakota meet up to have gay bareback sex together, and their boyfriends are none the wiser.
title: Jeffrey Lloyd And Dakota Payne Cheat On Their Boyfriends
